parameters.name: player

This can be either a SteamID or name.

parameters.name: has_expired
parameters.description: Filter by bans which have (not) expired yet.

player_ip.description: The player's IP address at the time of their ban.

plugin_version.description:
The cs2kz plugin version at the time of the ban.

This is either the version the [`server`] was currently running on, or the latest
current version, if they player got banned by an admin directly.

[`server`]: Ban::server
